                                                    </a>
                    </div>

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>
                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/5892474813/pinglun" target="_blank">清风流水520</a>
                                    </h3>
                                    <!-- 作者标识 -->
                                                                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-author">
                                            <span class="text-scale">作者</span>
                                        </div>
                                                                        <!-- 用户等级 -->
                                                                            <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/user/tequan/" target="_blank">
                                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-level" src="https://res.smzdm.com/h5/h5_user/dist/assets/level/8.png">
                                        </a>
                                                                                                                <!-- 勋章 -->
                                        <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-medal" src="https://eimg.smzdm.com/202501/15/6787651439fa26859.png" alt="">
                                                                    </div>
                                
                                <!-- 浮层 -->
                                <div id="actionBox" class="margin-right-15">
                                    <i class="J_more icon-more action-sheet-icon"></i>
                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_279930583" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>
                                        <!-- 踩评论功能 -->
                                        <a class="caiNum" href="javascript:void(0);" id="cdc_oppose_279930583" data-item="3, 0, 279930583, 93656109, 279930583">踩评论<span>(0)</span></a>
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                                                                            </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>页面中间“大额红包天天抽”可中银行卡满减红包（如500-20元）可还信用卡</span>
                                <!-- radio_3_4 宽高比例3:4 -->
                                <!-- data-radio值 0 4:3，  1 1:1，  2 3:4 -->
                                                                                                                            </div>
                            <!-- 用户信息 及点赞操作 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info">
                                <div>

                                <li class="comment-main-list-item" data-exposure="0" data-smzdm-id="7409432219" data-comment-id="279949779" data-comment-info="{&quot;is_visible&quot;: 0, &quot;action_top&quot;: 0, &quot;is_top&quot;: 0}">
                    <!-- 头像区域 -->
                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-avatar">
                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/7409432219/pinglun" target="_blank">
                            <!-- 用户头像 -->
                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-avatar-head" src="https://avatarimg.smzdm.com/default/7409432219/65e018a0a69935605-small.jpg" alt="">
                            <!-- 头像挂件 -->
                                                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-avatar-ornament" src="https://qneimg.smzdm.com/202410/12/670a2815d6f275144.png" alt="挂件">
                                                        <!-- V标识 -->
                                                    </a>
                    </div>

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->

                                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-info-zan" id="cdc_support_281016942" data-item="3, 1, 281016942, 93656109, 281016942">

                        <div class="list-item-level1">

<!-- 删除评论的二次确认弹窗 -->

    <div class="del-comment-confirm-mask"></div>
    <div class="del-comment-confirm">
        <div class="del-comment-confirm-title">提示信息</div>

        <div class="del-comment-confirm-group">
            <div class="del-comment-btn-cancel">取消</div>
            <div class="del-comment-btn-confirm">确认</div>
        </div>

    <i id="popClose" class="pop-close icon-times-o-thin">
        <!--[if lt IE 8]>x<![endif]--></i>
    <div class="pop-title" id="popTitle">
        <div class="pop-name">评论举报</div>
    </div>
    <div class="pop-content">
        <div class="pop_width_400">
            <p class="pop_info">
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_1" name="report">

                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_2" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_2">低俗色情！</label></span>
                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_3" name="report">

                <span class="pop_jubao jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" class="normal" id="pop_report_4" name="report">

                <span class="pop_jubao_other jubao-circle">
                    <input type="radio" id="pop_report_9" name="report">
                    <label for="pop_report_9">其他有害！</label></span>
            </p>
            <div id="pop_report_opinion" style="display:none;">
                <textarea cols="6" rows="80" class="textarea" onfocus="document.getElementById('note').style.display='none'" onblur="if(value=='')document.getElementById('note').style.display='block'" style="width:378px;"></textarea>
                <div id="note" class="note">请输入举报内容，最少输入2个字</div>
                <p>
                </p>
            </div>
            <input type="submit" class="btn-cancel" value="取消">
            <input id="pop_report_submit" type="submit" class="btn_login btn_login1" value="确定">
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

  <div class="side-stuff new-stuff">
